description: This file defines and configures an 'Agent' for stock analysis using yfinance tools, including setting up the agent's model, tools, and a sample response command.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: A class representing an agent that performs stock analysis and interacts with tools.

classes.name: LangDB
classes.description: A class representing the language database model used by the agent.

classes.name: YFinanceTools
classes.description: A class providing tools for fetching financial data from yfinance.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Method of the agent to generate and print a response based on a prompt.
